data.meta_description: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy have welcomed their third baby together. See the first photo of their son here.
data.text:
Dancing With the Starsâ€™ Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy are officially a family of five! The couple welcomed their third son, Milan Maksim Chmerkovskiy, on July 12.

Chmerkovskiy announced the news on Instagram, sharing a photo of himself and Murgatroyd holding the baby boy in the hospital. â€œHe is officially evicted from his mom and he is sooooo cute!!!!â€ the So You Think You Can Dance judge wrote in the caption. â€œBirth details later but for now we wanted to let you all know that mom and baby are doing perfect, and delivery took around 47 seconds total! Exactly one push.â€ He added: â€œAlso thank you all for the beautiful messages we have been receiving. Means a lot and very much appreciated.â€

Congratulations you guys so thrilled!! â¤ï¸.â€ Chmerkovskiyâ€™s sister-in-law, Jenna Johnson, also commented on the post, leaving three blue heart emojis.

More: Meet the Dancing With the Stars Prosâ€™ Partners in Real Life

Chmerkovskiy and Murgatroyd, who have been married since 2017, are already parents to sons Shai, 7, and Rio, 1. Murgatroyd found out she was pregnant for the third time just four months after she had given birth to Rio. â€œWe Are Having A Baby ğŸ‰ğŸ™ˆğŸ™ğŸ»Yes we knowâ€¦we just had a babyâ€¦ haha! This was very unexpected at (4 months postpartum with Rio) but we are sooooo happy and so ready to be a family of 5 soon!â€ Murgatroyd wrote on Instagram.

On March 21, 2024, the couple revealed that they would be welcoming another boy to their growing â€œwolf pack.â€ Murgatroyd shared a video set to The Supremeâ€™s â€œBaby Love,â€ which showed Shai sitting behind a white cake with a fondant sign that read â€œWeâ€™re here for the sex!â€ The video then cut to several clips of the entire Chmerkovskiy-Murgatroyd clan, including the dancersâ€™ parents, participating in a maternity shoot.

After taking photos with giant blue and pink balloons, the family headed outside and watched as Chmerkovskiy and Murgatroyd released confetti poppers into the sky. Blue confetti exploded from them, signaling that the couple were having another boy. They kissed and embraced, as Shai ran around the yard holding blue balloons.
